overview:
Raj Kamdar, a tech geek from birth! Born in Ahmedabad on June 26th 1996, he started going into tech since he was 7. At age of 9, he started his first blog named “Godfather Of All”. It was just a timepass and useless blog.

Then, a year later, he started a site with “Me” which later changed it’s name to “Snappville”. The site intended Social Networking and was named “Cechaters”.

He passed a couple of years making useless sites until in his 8th grade, he made “Bollywood N Masala”, a bollywood blog. The blog got quite nice due to it’s copy-paste content!!

Again, for a couple of years, because of no internet connectivity, he didn’t make too many sites. On reaching 11th grade, he got intyernet connectivity at home first time in September 2011. Since then, his blog BNM (Bollywood N Masala) flourished. A month later, he also started another blog “Technology Pandit” which had all the tech news.

In Feb 2012, he renamed BNM and Technology Pandit to MyBollywood..! and Inside Tech respectively. He also started developing a few sites for companies of relatives like 360* Accounting. He also made an unofficial wedding site for his cousin’s marriage.

He currently is a 11th grade student and after a month his 12th std. would start. His hobbies include Sports, Adventure, Eating, Photography, Internet and Literature.
